alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Muscogee, central Chattahoochee and southeastern Harris Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Flat Rock, or 7 miles northeast of Columbus. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Fort Moore, North Fort Moore, Bibb City, Upatoi, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Eelbeck/West Fort Moore, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park, Fortson, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, and Flat Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
